ConfigurableAnsiColorCodeMap - Class in ie.gmit.dip
ConfigurableAnsiColorCodeMap is a simple class which allows the user to define, control, and extend the colors used for printing text to a terminal/console window.

Constructor method which initializes the color map with default values via the DefaultAnsiColorCodeMap.
containsColor(String) - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.ConfigurableAnsiColorCodeMap
Method to test whether the map already contains a color.

The key method for a convertible is the convert method.
convert() - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.ConvertibleString
This is the central and important method which converts the instance variable this.convertible, and sets the converted variable this.converted.
convert(String) - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.AbstractStringConverter
The convert method takes a String as input and returns a converted String as output.
convert(String) - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.StringCaseConverter
Convert method which takes a String as input and converts it to title case, lower case, or upper case depending on the definition of the caseModifier variable.
convert(String) - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.StringColourConverter
Overridden convert method which modifies the color at the beginning and end of the String.
convert(String) - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.StringSynonymConverter
The convert method which delegates conversion of a string to its synonym via the getSynonym method.
convert(T) - Method in interface ie.gmit.dip.AbstractConverter
The convert method takes a type T as input, and returns a type U.
ConvertibleString - Class in ie.gmit.dip
ConvertibleString is a concrete class which implements the AbstractConvertible interface.

Simple constructor method.

convertString(String) - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.ThesaurusMapTextSimplifier
